description.description: Description of what the IOC does

port.description: The port name for this asyn object

no_process_eos.description: Set to avoid processing end of string

simulation.description: IP port to connect to if in simulation mode

port.description: Serial port tty name / IP address optionally followed by protocol

no_process_eos.description: Set to avoid processing end of string

simulation.description: IP port to connect to if in simulation mode

max_bytes.description: Max size in bytes for sending arrays over channel access

name.description: A name for an interrupt vector variable

count.description: The number of interrupt vectors to reserve

name.description: Name to refer to when making a channel

sample_size.description: Number of samples for triggered capture

name.description: A name to reference this EVR

NOEOS.description: No EOS used if set to 1

name.description: Name to use for the geobrick's asyn port

PORT.description: Asyn port name for PmacAsynIPPort to connect to

P.description: PV Prefix for all pmac db templates

numAxes.description: number of axes to initialize for the controller

FEEDRATE.description: feedrate below which we go into error

name.description: Object name and gui association name

axis.description: which axis number this motor drives

P.description: PV prefix name for this motor

M.description: PV motor name for this motor

RDBL.description: Readback Location, set URIP =1 if you specify this

NTM.description: New Target Monitor, only set to 0 for soft motors

FEHHSV.description: HIHI alarm severity for following error

FEHSV.description: HIGH alarm severity for following error

HOMEVIS.description: If 1 then home is visible on the gui

alh.description: Set this to alh to add the motor to the alarm handler and send emails

HOME.description: Prefix for autohome instance. Defaults to $(P) If unspecified

ALLOW_HOMED_SET.description: Set to a blank to allow this axis to have its homed

name.description: Object name and gui association name

CsController.description: Coordinate system controller to attach to

axis.description: which axis number this motor drives

P.description: PV prefix name for this motor

M.description: PV motor name for this motor

RDBL.description: Readback Location, set URIP =1 if you specify this

NTM.description: New Target Monitor, only set to 0 for soft motors

FEHHSV.description: HIHI alarm severity for following error

FEHSV.description: HIGH alarm severity for following error

HOMEVIS.description: If 1 then home is visible on the gui

alh.description: Set this to alh to add the motor to the alarm handler and send emails

HOME.description: Prefix for autohome instance. Defaults to $(P) If unspecified

ALLOW_HOMED_SET.description: Set to a blank to allow this axis to have its homed

Controller.description: Geobrick on which to disable limits

PLC.description: PLC number of the auto home PLC

GRP1.description: name of the 'ALL' group of auto home axes

GRP2.description: name of the second group of auto home axes

GRP3.description: name of the third group of auto home axes

GRP4.description: name of the fourth group of auto home axes

GRP5.description: name of the fourth group of auto home axes

GRP6.description: name of the fourth group of auto home axes

GRP7.description: name of the fourth group of auto home axes

GRP8.description: name of the fourth group of auto home axes

GRP9.description: name of the fourth group of auto home axes

name.description: Asyn port name for this object

ip_site_number.description: Site on the carrier for this IP Module (0=A, 1=B, 2=C, 3=D)

interrupt_vector.description: Interrupt Vector reserved with epics.InterruptVectorVME, count=3

link.description: Link number on this IP module (0 or 1)
Link number on this IP module (0 or 1)

i_abserr.description: Absolute error limit (TODO what is i_abserr vs abserr ?)

hyscycle_dly.description: Seconds to wait in hysteresis cycle: time of PS between min and max value

hyscydir.description:
Direction of hysteresis cycle:
approaching set point from above (-) or below (+) at the end of the cycle

hyscmask.description:
Defines the number of hysteresis cycles to run (for values >1 (3, 7, ...)
the seq delay has to be specified in an extra template)

hyslock.description:
The value "locked" will force the PS to do a full cycle,
whenever the value I-SET is changed in the wrong direction (against HYCDIR)

oninitcycle.description:
Flag to determine if power supply should do a hysteresis cycle
when it is switched ON

entities.description: List of entities this IOC instantiates

generic_ioc_image.description: The generic IOC container image registry URL
